transcript:
a shock he would inflict on his father and mother by the news of this loss, he knew what a relief it would be to escape it all, and felt that Dolokhov knew that he could save him from all this shame and sorrow, but wanted now to play with him as a cat does with a mouse. 
"Your cousin . . ." D61okhov started to say, but Nicholas interrupted him. 
"My cousin has nothing to do with this and it's not necessary to mention her!" he ex- claimed fiercely. 
"Then when am I to have it?"
